= Introduction =

This is a green program. There are serveral simple steps to run it.
# Download and unzip newest version of "Hoo Eye Relaxant".
# Download third party DLL: "3P.zip"
# Unzip "3P.zip" to "Hoo Eye Relaxant" folder too.
# Execute "Hoo Eye Relaxant.exe"
# One notify icon will be laughed.
# Right click notify icon and setting it.
